name: Space Bricks - Easy Puzzle Game
description:
A calming experience that quickly evolves into a devilishly challenging puzzler.
A very simple game that will challenge you to think very fast.

Features:
- Simple rules
- Intuitive gameplay
- Difficult to master
- Beautiful, colorful, minimalist design.
- Great sound and music ambience that teleports you to the outer space
- Use your weapon arsenal to remove and combine better blocks: laser, beam and time warp

How to Play:
The gameplay is simple.
- Move the falling blocks into the best position to combine blocks and clear rows.
- Place 2 blocks of the same color on top of each other to combine them into a single block of a darker color.
- Create a row of blocks with same color to clear the row.
- Don't let your stack of blocks hit the top.

- Use laser to remove one block (double tap over one block / no limit in each play)
- Use beam to remove blocks with same color (long press over the screen / once in each play)
- Use time warp to slowdown time (use clock icon to activate / once in each play)

Super simple, surprisingly challenging.
